title: Welcome!
long:

 This website is a tool for me to practice HTML, CSS, PHP, and JS.

title: Recipes

long:

title: No access test
long: Error 503: server recieved invalid response from the upstream server.

title: Invalid request test
long: Error 404: server could not find what was requested.

title: Bored
abstract: How can you be bored when there is so much to learn about programming!
long:
You can watch the ninja fights below, or go play [this game](https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/794762400/) I made to practice programming on scratch.
